hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about working with Allure Agency

q1.question: How Can I Join Allure as a Talent?
q1.answer:
You can apply through our mobile app or website by creating an account and completing your profile with professional media and measurements.
All applications are carefully reviewed by our team, and profiles that meet our standards and requirements are approved.

q2.question: What Are the Requirements to Join?
q2.answer:
Requirements vary by category. In general, applicants are expected to complete their profile with accurate personal details, physical appearance information, and clear photos. A general casting video is also required.
If you have a specific skill or special talent, you can select your profession from the available categories and upload a relevant video showcasing your ability.

q3.question: Is There a Fee to Join Allure?
q3.answer:
No, registration with Allure is completely free. We do not charge any upfront fees for representation.
We believe in equal opportunities, allowing talents to apply to all suitable jobs without restrictions.
